title: Why are forums sorted by country and not by language (Riot please read)
body: ^ Instead of seperating the forums by region seperate them by language. No OCE, NA forums just an English forum. Riot please it would make things so much easier.

replies.body: regions is fine. That way if people are looking for other players they need people from the same region to play. We are the oce community so we should be together.
People talk about language like it's a common problem on here, I haven't seen a post in a foreign language here ever.
